Reviews.Title: “Not bad”

Reviews.Content: girlfriend stayed rome nights tight budget preferring private hostel looked cheap options led hotel york honestly picky people dont expect luxury pay little hotel perfect train station literally 3 minutes quiet spacious wouldnt rave nice serious complaints rougher town safe 3 layers locked doors romantic beautiful dont cheap nice sleep night perfect amazing rome spend time outside sleeping complaint confusing regards knowing booking booked hotel name location met owner center town told follow wed minutes towards train station didnt book stay hotel york nice satisfy
